knimeNode.name: Directory Prefix Loader
knimeNode.shortDescription: Create a prefix port based on directory and filename prefix.

fullDescription.intro: Create a prefix port based on directory and filename prefix. This can be used by specific Generic KNIME Nodes to load an unknown number of files at runtime which all match this common prefix.
fullDescription.option: Specifies the full name of a directory plus optionally a common prefix of a set of files. E.g., specify /home/user/files/indexfile to load /home/user/files/indexfile.1 /home/user/files/indexfile.2, ... where the number of files to be loaded is unknown.
